title: 1hourCD
blurb: 1 hour CD designed consisting of songs us library shelvers listened to during our 1 hour shifts
description: My first job was working as a library shelver in a library between the years of 2009â€“2013. This experience really shaped my interests and career and who I am. I saw that most shelvers listened to music when shelving but we never spoke about it, so I wanted to connect us throughout the sheet, and then I made a CD (it was the time we used CDs:) and designed the album cover and gave one to each shelver.
